entry.title: LKE-2 (ember leg warmers)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Leg Warmers
Price: 21.00

Step into the coziest leg warmers with an undeniably Nordic flair. These leg warmers are the ultimate in cozy comfort, perfect for lounging around the house and made to wear with a dress, skirt, or over leggings for extra fall & winter weather coverage. 

  • 100% Wool
  • Swiss Azo free dyes
  • One size fits all

    care: Hand wash separately in cold water. Lay flat to dry or tumble dry on low heat

     

    Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: EK-1 (Amrita Beanie)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Hats
Price: 17.00

This pom-pom beanie is perfect companion for your outdoor activities and provides extra comfort for fall & winter weather. All our knitwear are hand-knitted in Nepal by our women knitters in their homes situated on the foothills of the beautiful Himalayan range. 

  • One size fits all
  • Hand wash

 


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: KBFC-2 (flower & leafs adorn mittens)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Mittens
Price: 16.00

The perfect winter mittens for running, hiking, cross-country skiing and snowshoeing. Wear our coziest mittens with an undeniably Nordic flair. These mittens are the ultimate in cozy comfort, warm and breathable for  perfect extra fall & winter weather coverage. 

Fabric & Care
  • Shell is made of 100% Wool.
  • Lining is made of 100% fleece.
  • Machine wash, line dry.
  • Stays warm when wet and naturally resists odors.
  • Azo free dyes.
  • One size fits all.


    • Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Hats
Price: 16.00

The perfect winter hats for running, hiking, cross-country skiing and snowshoeing. Wear our coziest hat with an undeniably Nordic flair.  This hat is the ultimate in cozy comfort, warm and breathable for perfect extra fall & winter weather coverage.
